SENT.plain: The American Society of Reproductive Medicine meeting (formerly the American Fertility Society) was held in Boston, Massachusetts, USA, on November 2-6, 1996
Numerous abstracts concerning original research in reproductive immunology were presented at the meeting

In addition, seminars and round table discussions were held on the topics of hormonal immunocontraception, immunologic testing in reproduction, antiphospholipid syndrome, endometriosis, and immunologic infertility
